humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report provides the size of the largest invasive tumor focus, which is 2.2 cm. Based on the rules provided, this falls under T2 tumors, which are more than 2 cm but not more than 5 cm. Therefore, the T stage for this patient's cancer is T2.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The T stage for cancer is determined by the size of the primary tumor. In this report, the maximum dimension of the invasive component of the tumor is 2.2 cm (part A). This falls within the range for T2 (2.1 to 5.0 cm), as per the TNM staging system for cancer. Therefore, the T stage from this report is T2.
